item.title: 巨型浮筒正在运往巴西的途中，标志着价值 23 亿美元项目的重要里程碑
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）首席执行官玛格达-尚布里亚特（Magda Chambriard）宣布 P-78 FPSO 从新加坡启航前往巴西布齐奥斯油田，这是公司盐前开采扩张的里程碑。【原文：Petrobras chief executive Magda Chambriard announces sailaway of P-78 FPSO from Singapore to Brazil’s Buzios field, marking milestone in company’s pre-salt expansion】

item.title: 塞尔维亚推进俄罗斯天然气新协议计划
item.description: 塞尔维亚天然气进口商和分销商的高级官员称，近期内没有可负担得起的俄罗斯天然气进口替代品【原文：Senior official at Serbian gas importer and distributor says no affordable alternatives to imports of Russian gas in the near term】

item.title: 特立尼达资产收购再遭拖延
item.description: Predator 于 2 月与挑战者能源公司达成协议，收购后者在特立尼达和多巴哥的全部业务【原文：Predator in February entered into an agreement with Challenger Energy to acquire the entirety of the latter's operations in Trinidad and Tobago】

item.title: 中石油在川东北启动最后一个酸性气田，雪佛龙的传奇就此终结
item.description: 中国石油迄今为止开发的含硫量最高的独口河-七里碑酸性气田已经投产，从而完善了曾经依赖雪佛龙技术合作的川东北天然气群。【原文：PetroChina has brought online the Dukouhe-Qilibei sour gas field — its most sulphur-rich development to date — completing the Chuandongbei gas cluster that once relied on Chevron’s technical partnership】
